prompt: Describe the primary technical considerations when implementing blockchain technology for supply chain management.
Describe the role of caching in improving the performance of large-scale web applications. Explain how caching can mitigate the impact of increased user concurrency on system resources.
Describe the primary technical considerations involved in implementing a decentralized storage solution for a large-scale IoT network.
Describe the role of caching in improving the performance of large-scale web applications. Explain how caching strategies can be optimized to enhance scalability and reduce latency.
Describe the primary functionalities and technical considerations for implementing a blockchain-based supply chain management system.
